info.description: Interactive API documentation for the Local Discovery App.
info.title: Empre Backend API

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token
Send a reset link to the user's email
Update password using a valid reset token
Obtain a new access token using a refresh token
Create a new user account with email and password

get.description: Get a paginated list of all business categories

post.description: Register a new category for business entities

get.description: Get details of a specific business category

put.description: Update details of a specific business category (Owner only)

delete.description: Remove a specific business category (Owner only)

get.description: Get a paginated list of the last message from each active conversation, formatted as DTOs
Get all messages in a conversation with a specific business
Upgrade to WebSocket for real-time messaging
Search entities with geographic and category filters (Map View)

post.description: Register a new business entity with basic details

get.description: Get a paginated list of business entities owned by the current user
Get full details of a specific business entity

put.description: Update details of a specific business entity (Owner only)

delete.description: Remove a specific business entity (Owner only)

post.description: Upload a profile, banner, or gallery image for a specific entity
Upload an image to S3 and get a secure UUID mapping

get.description: Fetch image binary data using its secure UUID mapping

Get profile details of the currently authenticated user
Get profile details of the currently authenticated user

post.description: Upload a new profile picture for the authenticated user

sent_by_entity.description: True if owner responding as business
